acceptance_criteria.structure_parity: Main heading, QR editor section, billing plans display
acceptance_criteria.functional_parity: Display QR editor placeholder, fetch and show billing plans from API
acceptance_criteria.seo_a11y: Proper page title, semantic HTML, accessible form elements

acceptance_criteria.structure_parity: Pricing header, plan cards with features, CTA buttons
acceptance_criteria.functional_parity: Display all billing plans, link to /billing/checkout for paid plans
acceptance_criteria.seo_a11y: Page title 'Pricing', semantic headings, accessible navigation

acceptance_criteria.structure_parity: Editor form, preview panel, export controls
acceptance_criteria.functional_parity: Call /qr endpoint (stub ok), display live preview placeholder, export buttons
acceptance_criteria.seo_a11y: Page title 'QR Editor', labeled form fields, keyboard accessible

acceptance_criteria.functional_parity: Display template cards, click to use template in editor
acceptance_criteria.seo_a11y: Page title 'Templates', image alt text, grid navigation

acceptance_criteria.structure_parity: Dashboard header, saved QR codes list, action buttons
acceptance_criteria.functional_parity: Display saved QR codes placeholder, link to create new
acceptance_criteria.seo_a11y: Page title 'Dashboard', semantic lists, accessible buttons

acceptance_criteria.structure_parity: Login form, email/password fields, submit button
acceptance_criteria.functional_parity: Auth form placeholder, link to signup
acceptance_criteria.seo_a11y: Page title 'Login', labeled inputs, form validation

acceptance_criteria.structure_parity: Signup form, name/email/password fields, submit button
acceptance_criteria.functional_parity: Registration form placeholder, link to login
acceptance_criteria.seo_a11y: Page title 'Sign Up', labeled inputs, password requirements
